mapper.select: select * from store where state = 2 and ( storename like concat('%',#{param1},'%') or addr2 like concat('%',#{param1},'%') )

select *, @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rnum from store, (select @rownum:=0) as r where (state >= 0) and ( storename like concat('%',#{param1},'%') or addr1 like concat('%',#{param1},'%') or addr2 like concat('%',#{param1},'%')) limit #{param2},10
select ceil(count(*)/10) from store where (state >= 0) and ( storename like concat('%',#{param1},'%') or addr1 like concat('%',#{param1},'%') or addr2 like concat('%',#{param1},'%'))
